issues.description: The problem statement text refers to attributes using shortened names ('inscribedStudents', 'guestStudents') while the UML diagram, test names and the solution use the full names ('numberOfInscribedStudents', 'numberOfGuestStudents'). This naming inconsistency in the problem description could confuse students about the exact attribute names they should implement (the tests expect the 'numberOf...' names).
issues.suggested_fix: Make attribute naming consistent across the problem text and UML/tests. Update the textual description to reference 'numberOfInscribedStudents' and 'numberOfGuestStudents' (or change the UML/tests to the shorter names) so students clearly know which attribute names to implement.
